casebody.data:
IN RE: E.D. 125PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2018 Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, for E.D.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of November 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 17th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
